select from t_sale_order
select from t_sale_order
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_sale_order
id , customer_id , customer_name , merchant_id , merchant_name , out_depot_id , out_depot_name , model , lbx_no , po_no , business_model , delivery_date , code , state , refer_to_order , creater , create_date , auditor , audit_date , modifier , modify_date , remark , total_num , total_amount , in_depot_id , in_depot_name , create_name , audit_name , serve_types , contract_no , inspect_no , customs_no , out_depot_code , in_depot_code , topideal_code , is_same_area , end_date , tallying_unit , destination , country , receiver_name , receiver_address , mail_mode , order_source , own_month , original_out_depot_id , original_out_depot_name , original_out_depot_code , supplier_id , supplier_name , pay_subject , po_date , currency , modifier_username , receive_date , receive_name , receiver , bu_name , bu_id , order_type , pre_sale_order_rel_code , bill_weight , transport , teu , trainNo , carrier , torus_number , outDepot_addr , link_uniue_code , amount_status , adjuster , adjust_date , adjuster_username , amount_confirm_status , amount_confirmer , amount_confirm_username , amount_confirm_date , pay_rules , invoice_no , port_des , pack , box_num , torr_pack_type , out_customs_id , out_customs_code , out_platform_customs , in_customs_id , in_customs_code , in_platform_customs , submiter , submiter_name , submit_date , finance_status , is_generate_declare , payment_terms , trade_terms , approval_no , write_off_status , write_off_date , stock_location_type_id , stock_location_type_name ,
VALUES
#{id} , #{customerId} , #{customerName} , #{merchantId} , #{merchantName} , #{outDepotId} , #{outDepotName} , #{model} , #{lbxNo} , #{poNo} , #{businessModel} , #{deliveryDate} , #{code} , #{state} , #{referToOrder} , #{creater} , #{createDate} , #{auditor} , #{auditDate} , #{modifier} , #{modifyDate} , #{remark} , #{totalNum} , #{totalAmount} , #{inDepotId} , #{inDepotName} , #{createName} , #{auditName} , #{serveTypes} , #{contractNo} , #{inspectNo} , #{customsNo} , #{outDepotCode} , #{inDepotCode} , #{topidealCode} , #{isSameArea} , #{endDate} , #{tallyingUnit} , #{destination} , #{country} , #{receiverName} , #{receiverAddress} , #{mailMode} , #{orderSource} , #{ownMonth} , #{originalOutDepotId} , #{originalOutDepotName} , #{originalOutDepotCode} , #{supplierId} , #{supplierName} , #{paySubject} , #{poDate} , #{currency} , #{modifierUsername} , #{receiveDate} , #{receiveName} , #{receiver} , #{buName} , #{buId} , #{orderType} , #{preSaleOrderRelCode} , #{billWeight} , #{transport} , #{teu} , #{trainno} , #{carrier} , #{torusNumber} , #{outdepotAddr} , #{linkUniueCode} , #{amountStatus} , #{adjuster} , #{adjustDate} , #{adjusterUsername} , #{amountConfirmStatus} , #{amountConfirmer} , #{amountConfirmUsername} , #{amountConfirmDate} , #{payRules} , #{invoiceNo} , #{portDes} , #{pack} , #{boxNum} , #{torrPackType} , #{outCustomsId} , #{outCustomsCode} , #{outPlatformCustoms} , #{inCustomsId} , #{inCustomsCode} , #{inPlatformCustoms} , #{submiter} , #{submiterName} , #{submitDate} , #{financeStatus} , #{isGenerateDeclare} , #{paymentTerms} , #{tradeTerms} , #{approvalNo}, #{writeOffStatus} , #{writeOffDate} , #{stockLocationTypeId} , #{stockLocationTypeName} ,
mapper.delete:
delete from t_sale_order where id in
#{id}
mapper.sql: id, customer_id, customer_name, merchant_id, merchant_name, out_depot_id, out_depot_name, model, lbx_no, po_no, business_model, delivery_date, code, state, refer_to_order, creater, create_date, auditor, audit_date, modifier, modify_date, remark, total_num, total_amount, in_depot_id, in_depot_name, create_name, audit_name, serve_types, contract_no, inspect_no, customs_no, out_depot_code, in_depot_code, topideal_code, is_same_area, end_date, tallying_unit, destination, country, receiver_name, receiver_address, mail_mode, order_source, own_month, original_out_depot_id, original_out_depot_name, original_out_depot_code, supplier_id, supplier_name, pay_subject, po_date, currency, modifier_username, receive_date, receive_name, receiver, bu_name, bu_id, order_type, pre_sale_order_rel_code, bill_weight, transport, teu, trainNo, carrier, torus_number, outDepot_addr, link_uniue_code, amount_status, adjuster, adjust_date, adjuster_username, amount_confirm_status, amount_confirmer, amount_confirm_username, amount_confirm_date, pay_rules, invoice_no, port_des, pack, box_num, torr_pack_type, out_customs_id, out_customs_code, out_platform_customs, in_customs_id, in_customs_code, in_platform_customs, submiter, submiter_name, submit_date, finance_status, is_generate_declare, payment_terms, trade_terms, approval_no, write_off_status, write_off_date, stock_location_type_id, stock_location_type_name
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_sale_order SET state = '006' where id in
#{id}

where.trim:
merchant_id= #{merchantId} and code in
#{subcode}
and
out_depot_id= #{outDepotId} and merchant_name like '%${merchantName}%' and customer_id= #{customerId} and delivery_date between #{deliveryDate} and adddate(date(#{deliveryDate}),1) and
date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= #{createDateStartDate} and
date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= #{createDateEndDate} and
state= #{state} and po_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{poNo},'%') and order_source= #{orderSource} and business_model= #{businessModel} and bu_id= #{buId} and order_type= #{orderType} and bu_id in
#{buId}
and
amount_status= #{amountStatus} and amount_confirm_status= #{amountConfirmStatus} and state in
#{state}
and
id in
#{id}
and
po_no in
#{po}
and
(( date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{orderStartDate} and #{orderEndDate}) or (date_format(modify_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{orderStartDate} and #{orderEndDate})) and
(date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{orderStartDate} ) or (date_format(modify_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{orderStartDate} ) and
(date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{orderEndDate} ) or (date_format(modify_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{orderEndDate} ) and
merchant_id in
#{merchantId}
and
create_name like concat('%', #{createName}, '%') and write_off_status= #{writeOffStatus} and state != "006"

mapper.select: select from t_sale_order order by id desc
select from t_sale_order order by id desc
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sale_order SET in_depot_id=null, in_depot_name=null,in_depot_code=null where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_sale_order where po_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{poNo},'%') and state!='006'
select from t_sale_order order by id desc
select from t_sale_order
select from t_sale_order
select t1.* from t_sale_order_item t1 where t1.order_id = #{id}

SELECT s.* FROM t_sale_order s LEFT JOIN t_sale_order_item so ON s.id = so.order_id WHERE s.state in ('003', '018') AND s.business_model = '2' AND s.merchant_id = #{merchantId} AND s.out_depot_id = #{depotId} AND so.goods_no = #{goodsNo} ORDER BY s.create_date
select * from t_sale_order where code = #{code} and merchant_id = #{merchantId} and state != '006'

select t2.code,t1.goods_id,t1.barcode from t_sale_order_item t1 left join t_sale_order t2 on t2.id = t1.order_id where t2.code = #{code} and t2.state!='006' and t1.barcode = #{barcode} group by t2.code,t1.goods_id,t1.barcode

select c.id,c.goods_id,c.tallying_unit,SUM(IF(c.num-IFNULL(j.shelf_damaged_num,0)<0,0,c.num-IFNULL(j.shelf_damaged_num,0))) AS num, c.sale_item_id from ( select t3.id,i.goods_id,t2.tallying_unit,SUM(IFNULL(i.transfer_num,0)+IFNULL(i.worn_num,0)) AS num, i.sale_item_id from t_sale_out_depot_item i LEFT JOIN t_sale_out_depot t3 ON t3.id=i.sale_out_depot_id left join t_sale_order t2 ON t2.id = t3.sale_order_id where t2.bu_id =#{buId} and t2.customer_id=#{customerId} and t2.business_model in ('1','4','3') and t2.state IN('003','018','019','025', '026','031') and t3.`status` in ('018','026','031') and t2.create_date > #{periodDate} group by t3.id,i.goods_id,i.tallying_unit,i.sale_item_id ) c left join ( select t3.id,s.goods_id,s.tallying_unit,SUM(IFNULL(s.shelf_num,0)+IFNULL(s.damaged_num,0)+IFNULL(s.lack_num,0)) AS shelf_damaged_num, s.sale_item_id from t_sale_shelf s left join t_sale_order t2 ON t2.id = s.order_id LEFT JOIN t_sale_out_depot t3 ON t3.id=s.sale_out_depot_id where t2.bu_id =#{buId} and t2.customer_id=#{customerId} and t2.business_model in ('1','4','3') and t2.state IN('003','018','019','025', '026','031') and s.order_type='1' and t3.`status` in ('018','026','031') and t2.create_date > #{periodDate} group by t3.id,s.goods_id,s.tallying_unit,s.sale_item_id ) j on c.id=j.id AND c.goods_id=j.goods_id AND c.sale_item_id=j.sale_item_id and ( c.tallying_unit=j.tallying_unit OR ((c.tallying_unit='' OR c.tallying_unit='02' OR c.tallying_unit IS NULL) AND (j.tallying_unit='' OR j.tallying_unit='02' OR j.tallying_unit IS NULL)) ) where 1=1 group by c.id,c.goods_id,c.tallying_unit,c.sale_item_id HAVING num>0

select t2.id,s.goods_id,s.tallying_unit,SUM(IFNULL(s.shelf_num,0)) AS num,s.sale_item_id from t_sale_shelf s left join t_sale_order t2 ON t2.id = s.order_id LEFT JOIN t_sale_out_depot t3 ON t3.id=s.sale_out_depot_id where t2.bu_id =#{buId} and t2.customer_id=#{customerId} and t2.business_model in ('1','4','3') and t2.state IN('003','018','019','025', '026','031') and s.order_type='1' and t3.`status` in ('018','026','031') and t2.create_date > #{periodDate} group by t2.id,s.goods_id,s.tallying_unit, s.sale_item_id

SELECT t2.`code`,t2.customer_name,t2.customer_id,t2.merchant_id,t2.merchant_name,t2.bu_id,t2.bu_name from t_sale_po_rel t1 LEFT JOIN t_sale_order t2 ON t1.order_id=t2.id and t1.state='0' LEFT JOIN t_shelf t3 ON t3.sale_order_id=t2.id and t3.po_no=#{poNo} where t2.merchant_id=#{merchantId} and t2.state!='006' and t1.po_no=#{poNo} and t2.id is not null and t2.customer_id is not null and t2.bu_id is not null and t3.id is null ORDER BY t2.bu_id ASC

select * from t_sale_order
`state` != '006' and
`state` in ('003','019','018','031','026') and (date(create_date) > date_sub(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 60 DAY) and date(create_date) <= date(CURDATE())) and
po_no=#{poNo} and
merchant_id=#{merchantId} and
bu_id in
#{buId}
and
customer_id in
#{customerId}
and

select state, COUNT(1) as num from t_sale_order
GROUP BY state ORDER BY id desc
